title: Patsy Walker, A.K.A. Hellcat!, Volume 3: Careless Whiskers
description: Hellcat has had nothing but bad luck ever since the Black Cat crossed her path. But now that Felicia's got a whole girl gang in her claws, how can Patsy possibly win this cat fight?! Especially with her best friend on the fence, and distracted by an old flame...  COLLECTING: PATSY WALKER, A.K.A. HELLCAT! 13-17
author: Kate Leth
